name: @flow-desk/shared-rust
description: Flow Desk shared Rust library with NAPI bindings

scripts.build:both: npm run build:ffi && npm run build:napi
scripts.build:cli:all-targets: npm run install:targets && npm run build:targets
scripts.install:targets: rustup target add x86_64-apple-darwin aarch64-apple-darwin x86_64-pc-windows-gnu i686-pc-windows-gnu x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:targets: npm run build:darwin && npm run build:windows && npm run build:linux
scripts.build:darwin: cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target x86_64-apple-darwin && cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:windows: cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu && cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target i686-pc-windows-gnu
scripts.build:linux: cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && cargo build --release --bin flow_desk_cli --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
